vehicle_count.base_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Vehicles, Vehicle_Type FROM traffic_data WHERE Road = '{road}'

traffic_volume.base_sql: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ts, '{time_format}') AS Time_Period, COUNT(*) AS Total_Vehicles FROM traffic_data WHERE Road = '{road}'

average_speed.base_sql: SELECT AVG(velocity) AS Average_Speed, vehicle_type FROM traffic_data WHERE road = '{road}'
average_speed.group_by: GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY vehicle_type

lane_utilization.base_sql: SELECT lane, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE road = '{road}'
lane_utilization.group_by: GROUP BY lane ORDER BY lane
